Docs.summary: A Class representing a VirtualNetworkGatewayConnection along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetVirtualNetworkGatewayConnectionResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetVirtualNetworkGatewayConnection method.
